alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Comanche; Grady; Kiowa; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 5:24PM CDT until August 12 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Grady County in central Oklahoma... Southern Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Stephens County in southern Oklahoma... Eastern Kiowa County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 524 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles east of Chickasha to 5 miles northeast of Sterling to near Fort Sill, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lawton, Chickasha, Anadarko, Marlow, Cache, Elgin, Apache, Rush Springs, Fletcher, Cyril, Sterling, Fort Cobb, Alex, Verden, Cement, Amber, Medicine Park, Gracemont, Pocasset, and Norge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
